text: VivoCity is a mega mall in the south end of Singapore. With a rooftop deck (public access), it offers spectacular views of Sentosa, HarbourFront Centre, including the ferry terminal. You also get to view the PSA Brani Terminal, with the large cranes looking like jurassic monsters. It goes get very crowded over the weekends, so just be patient, move around casually, and have a chilled out time.
Just going up to rooftop, you can find a good view point! And also food plaza in there

A great shopping mall 2 stations. 1 connecting to sentosa and the other with harbor front. This is the entry point to sentosa and there is a boardwalk across the island. You could also take the sentosa express.
Very busy malls, lots of dining options and shops
Germany Brand Obermain Buy 1 Get 1 Free Promo (Limit Time), Welcome to shopping with us!
